attributes.action: Get those crazed BBC Bods to bring back Moira Stewart to the News Slot.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What are they thinking at the BBC. I have no problem paying the licence fee but not when they make ridiculous decisions such as this. She is the staple of our news generation!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
